Dhc, Facial Scrub (2020 formulation)

Brand: DHC

Category: Exfoliant/Scrub

Ingredients: WATER, STEARIC ACID, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, PRUNUS ARMENIACA (APRICOT) SEED POWDER, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, POTASSIUM COCOATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE SE, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, UREA, ALLANTOIN, SAPINDUS MUKUROSSI PEEL EXTRACT, CHLORHEXIDINE DIGLUCONATE, DIPOTASSI

GLUCONATE, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
